title: Pentagon Taps “Tiger Team” to Rush Weapons to Israel
description:
In its effort to speed up arms sales to Israel, the Biden administration dismissed concerns about harm to civilians in Gaza.

The post Pentagon Taps “Tiger Team” to Rush Weapons to Israel appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Sen. Elizabeth Warren Questions Meta Over Palestinian Censorship
description:
Facebook and Instagram’s wartime content moderation practices have “exacerbated violence and failed to combat hate speech,” the senator says.

The post Sen. Elizabeth Warren Questions Meta Over Palestinian Censorship appeared first on The Intercept.

title: State Department Stuns Congress, Saying Biden Is Not Even Reviewing Trump’s Terror Designation of Cuba
description:
In a rebuke to Obama’s effort to normalize relations with Cuba, Biden is sticking with Trump’s policy, even as a Cuban migrant crisis racks the border.

The post State Department Stuns Congress, Saying Biden Is Not Even Reviewing Trump’s Terror Designation of Cuba appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Joe Biden Keeps Repeating His False Claim That He Saw Pictures of Beheaded Babies
description:
Many atrocities were committed during the Hamas-led attacks on October 7. Yet the president of the United States continues to repeat debunked falsehoods.

The post Joe Biden Keeps Repeating His False Claim That He Saw Pictures of Beheaded Babies appeared first on The Intercept.
